about_the_game:
Your presence on this page is no accident. You have been selected as a potential candidate for the BiOSmose project. Your contribution is required. This mission is of the utmost importance.

After many years of discussion between industry and scientists, the committee has finally been given the go-ahead to start experimentation on the universal seed. Many agents are already at work, but your results could change everything.

The BiOSmose project database has already produced a number of encouraging results regarding the viability of the plant species discovered, but there’s still a long way to go. Sharpen your observation skills, calibrate the tools provided by the company, collect new data on the universal seed and master its power.

The universal seed is just the beginning. Your mission lies in your ability to understand the effects that the plant specimens from your experiments will have on other specimens, but also and above all, on the ecosystem in which they will have appeared.
Each of your discoveries is a step closer to the goal we’re all striving for. Every specimen you bring to light, every specimen you keep alive, may bring us closer to our ultimate goal. Maintaining balance is crucial, and all data must be recorded.

Features

  • Plant and create new plant species from a single seed : the universal seed
  • Each new species will modify the environment in its own way, discover and master all synergies !
  • Use your E.rbarium and the other tools at your disposal to experiment, understand and record your discoveries

BiOSmose is a short chill puzzle game, playable in solo, in which you will need to discover and master the different synergies between plants and soils in order to complete all levels. Each plant has different effects, and using them wisely will allow you to discover new plants, new soils, and even some mutations. Use the panel of tools at your disposal to analyze the plants and soils and understand how they work !
Our game is still in development, with a planned release in 2024. More news coming soon !

name: BiOSmose

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1 +) Windows 10 & Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: DX 10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: To address the sterility of the world, a single seed can change everything. Blending chill and puzzle game, BiOSmose is a game that invites you to revitalize depleted environments. Sow, discover, and learn to sustain various plants in this colorful universe.
